title: Shots Of Light
description: Words have tremendous power.They can inspire, empower, help, motivate and sometimes, they can change our life.This uplifiting and delightful little book is a powerful collection of insightful and inspiring words, quotes and thoughts. Brightened by beautiful and originals art pieces, Shots of Light is a heartening companion, a constant source of comfort and inspiration in times of need. Warning : Can change your life.Read one page a day as a daily shot of inspiration, or read it in one sitting as a vital vaccine to keep the darkness at bay and light up your life. This is a book which you can just pick up anytime and carry on where you left off last time.
author: Morgane J.A.
